data.title: Rovo: Unlock organizational knowledge with GenAI | Atlassian
data.description: Rovo, Atlassian's new GenAI product helps teams take action on organization knowledge using Rovo Search, Rovo Chat and specialized Rovo Agents.
data.content:

[Try Now](https://www.atlassian.com/software/rovo/start)

Human and AI collaboration at its best
======================================

Find, learn and act on organizational knowledge for even smarter teamwork.

[Try it free](https://www.atlassian.com/software/rovo/start)

[Contact sales](https://www.atlassian.com/software/rovo#form)

![Image 4](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/7ntgv8487sw4q8qj3wb5pq/gwp5090team25liftedlogo.png?auto=webp&format=png?auto=webp&max_age=31536000)

**April 8-10 • Anaheim, California**Discover how your teams can harness the power of data and go to market faster at Team ’25!

[Get your pass](https://events.atlassian.com/team?utm_medium=event-web-referral&utm_source=rovo_product-tour&event_context=lifted_bar-pre-event&utm_campaign=K:event%7CH:any%7CN:Team_25%7CP:agnostic%7CO:event-marketing%7CF:pre-event%7CC:event-home&utm_content=WEBTEAM-17396&event_id=216653)

![Image 5](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/7ntgv8487sw4q8qj3wb5pq/gwp5090team25liftedlogo.png?auto=webp&format=png?auto=webp&max_age=31536000)

**April 8-10 • Anaheim, California**Hear from leading product experts!

[Get your pass](https://events.atlassian.com/team?utm_medium=event-web-referral&utm_source=rovo_product-tour&event_context=lifted_bar-pre-event&utm_campaign=K:event%7CH:any%7CN:Team_25%7CP:agnostic%7CO:event-marketing%7CF:pre-event%7CC:event-home&utm_content=WEBTEAM-17396&event_id=216653)

 

### Rovo helps teams quickly discover knowledge across Atlassian and third-party SaaS apps with less time and effort.

 

### Team up with a Rovo Agent

Rovo Agents are virtual teammates that tackle specialized tasks with you. Get started with our Rovo Agents or build your own.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/rovo/features#act)

### There’s an Agent for that

Discover Rovo Agents on the Atlassian Marketplace to enhance any team workflow.

[Browse the Atlassian Marketplace](https://marketplace.atlassian.com/search?query=Rovo)

![Image 6: Two rows of company icons.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/ffrzmj4z386n3rx3pr398rn/third_party_agent_logos.png?auto=webp&format=png)

 

### Stop searching and start doing

Find what you are looking for in no time and get immediate answers to any question.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/rovo/features#find)

![Image 7: Row of company logos.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/26h9c953ck6nz4gkr9wpvbz/connectors_graphic.png?auto=webp&format=png)

### Instant insights as you work

Chat with Rovo as often as you need to get up to speed on teams, goals, projects, and more.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/rovo/features#learn)

 

Put Rovo to work on any team
----------------------------

### Engineer

Eliminate repetitive jobs, streamline code reviews, and improve code suggestions to deliver better code even faster.

### Program Manager

Schedule tasks, track milestones, and identify risks so you can keep projects on track and in budget.

### IT Professional

Accelerate onboarding, pinpoint root causes, conduct analyses, and handle follow-up tasks for peak efficiency.

### Business User

Find, create and update everything from marketing plans to financial analysis, empowering teams to do their best work.

AI powered by your teamwork data
--------------------------------

Rovo uses Atlassian’s Teamwork Graph to provide a holistic view of your organization’s goals, knowledge, actions, and people. When the picture is complete, outcomes improve.

![Image 8: Paper with lines illo.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/tmhxmxn3g4r8ncj6p7t3fqhm/document_icon.png)

#### Rovo Product Guide

Discover how Rovo can transform your team's workflow. No matter the team or task, Rovo is designed to help you excel. Learn about powerful workflows  designed to boost your productivity.

[Read the product guide](https://www.atlassian.com/software/rovo/guides/rovo-product-guide)

![Image 9: Dialogue bubble illos.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/crsj6bmqmj9z8tmfz4ffp45/chat_icon.png)

#### A CEO’s guide to AI-Powered Teamwork

What every CEO should know and do to successfully implement generative AI solutions that transform teamwork and achieve organizational excellence.

[Download the whitepaper](https://www.atlassian.com/whitepapers/a-ceos-guide-to-ai-powered-teamwork)

![Image 10: Loudspeaker illo.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/jv2fvvsv2s9jps5z3zvtk8w/megaphone_icon.png)

#### Rovo Launch Blog

Discover how Rovo transforms organizational knowledge into actionable insights for accelerated team productivity. Learn how Rovo is taking human-AI collaboration to new heights.

[Read the blog](https://www.atlassian.com/blog/announcements/team-24-eu-ai-updates)

![Image 11: Dialogue bubble illos.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/gptj779p4n9jg255x3hxgq8/AI_icon.png)

#### AI Collaboration Index

Research from Atlassian's Teamwork Lab shows that to get the most out of working with AI, mindset matters far more than adoption - which is key to maturity.

[Read the report](https://www.atlassian.com/blog/productivity/ai-collaboration-report)

![Image 12: Procore logo.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/nspccqxmwnqgh8fmnp8fk/procore_logo.png?auto=webp&format=png)

1/3

“Rovo Search is helping our teams find information much faster, reduce cognitive load, and stay in the flow. It’s really promising so far. I don't foresee a future where we don't have it.”

##### Ronny Katzenberger

Director of Engineering Enablement

![Image 13: OVO logo.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/k77rtr8c8j36ts2m4z4k6wmv/OVO_logo_image.png?auto=webp&format=png)

2/3

“Rovo’s seamless integration into our Atlassian platform ensures we can access information without switching tools. Information that previously took days to track down is now available instantly, making our workflows more efficient and helping us stay focused on the task at hand.”

##### Luke Collins

Senior Solutions Energy, OVO Energy

![Image 14: Teach for All logo.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/nj4rc74p5vm2xkqpnsj5b9z/teach_for_all_logo_image.png?auto=webp&format=png)

3/3

"Teach For All has a lot of content that uses internal terminology. I see Rovo & Atlassian Intelligence being particularly powerful in helping us quickly create materials and templates based on our internal content, but in a way that makes sense to our diverse stakeholders.”

##### Tapiwa Samkange

Director, IT Business Partner at Teach For All

[←](javascript:void(0) "Previous") [→](javascript:void(0) "Next") 

Nearly 75% of users say Rovo helps them get work done faster.
-------------------------------------------------------------

Source: Atlassian survey results of beta Rovo users

Early feedback suggests Rovo saves users 1-2 hours every week, on average.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Source: Atlassian Survey results of beta Rovo and internal users

![Image 15: Green check mark.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/srshkchckgk5bwjng5gnxn/Check_Circle.svg?auto=webp&format=png)

Secure data policies that include zero-day retention and no training of customer inputs or outputs from any LLM provider

![Image 16: Green check mark.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/srshkchckgk5bwjng5gnxn/Check_Circle.svg?auto=webp&format=png)

Strict permission enforcement to limit access to sensitive data

![Image 17: Green check mark.](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/srshkchckgk5bwjng5gnxn/Check_Circle.svg?auto=webp&format=png)

Commitment to help customers remain compliant with regulatory requirements, including GDPR, SOC 2, and ISO27001

### Enable AI powered teamwork without compromising privacy

Rovo maintains data security and privacy by design. For added protection, Rovo also leverages enterprise permissions to grant users access only to what you authorize - while still ensuring teams find exactly what they need.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/trust/atlassian-intelligence)

Get started with Atlassian Rovo
-------------------------------

Let’s chat about how AI-human collaboration can simplify the way teams work.

[Contact sales](https://www.atlassian.com/enterprise/contact)

###### Ready to take the next step?

Get in touch to get started.
